**WebSleuth** is a lightweight, developer-friendly Python library that simplifies web scraping. It wraps around core tools like `requests`, `BeautifulSoup`, user-agent rotation, proxy handling, retry logic, and moreâ€”designed to be the developer's alternative to boilerplate scraping setup.

## ğŸš€ Features

- âœ… Queue-based URL handling
- âœ… CSS & XPath parser support
- âœ… User-Agent rotation with `fake-useragent`
- âœ… Proxy support (including free/public proxies)
- âœ… Retry logic with exponential backoff
- âœ… Easy export to JSON or CSV
- âœ… Custom parser middleware support
- âœ… Zero CLI opinionation â€” integrate into your own code!
